issues.title: Criminal Justice Reform
issues.description: Strong advocate for reducing mass incarceration, supporting rehabilitation programs, and ending systemic racism in criminal justice system

issues.title: Healthcare Access
issues.description: Supports universal healthcare, expansion of Medi-Cal, and reducing healthcare costs for low-income communities

issues.title: Climate Change Legislation
issues.description: Supports aggressive carbon reduction targets, green energy investments, and environmental justice initiatives

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased public education funding, reducing student debt, and expanding community college access

issues.title: Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strong pro-choice supporter, advocates for comprehensive reproductive healthcare and protecting abortion access

issues.title: Housing Affordability
issues.description: Supports rent control, affordable housing initiatives, and addressing homelessness through comprehensive policy

issues.title: Workers' Rights
issues.description: Supports increased minimum wage, worker protections, and strengthening labor union capabilities

donors.data_source: California Secretary of State Campaign Finance Database
